solution_line_template: His first mile was in {first_mile_time} minutes, then {second_mile_time} minutes, another {third_mile_time} minutes and his final mile was {fourth_mile_time} minutes so it took him {first_mile_time}+{second_mile_time}+{third_mile_time}+{fourth_mile_time} = <<{first_mile_time}+{second_mile_time}+{third_mile_time}+{fourth_mile_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes

It took {total_time} minutes to run {total_miles} miles so his average time was {total_time}/{total_miles} = <<{total_time}/{total_miles}={average_time_per_mile}>>{average_time_per_mile} minutes per mile
